Birds Gone Wild
Home Contact Mission Profile
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Observable} from "rxjs"; import {User} from "../../models/user.model"; import {UserService} from "../../services/user.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.scss'] }) export class NavbarComponent { showModal = false; currentUser$: Observable constructor(private userService: UserService) { this.currentUser$ = this.userService.currentUser$; } openModal(): void { this.showModal = true; } closeModal(): void { this.showModal = false; } logout(): void { this.userService.logout(); this.closeModal(); } }
